snippet: The worst floods in more than 50 years threaten to overwhelm barriers protecting Bangkok, and residents should be prepared, said Deputy Prime Minister Kittiratt Na-Ranong.
lead_paragraph: The worst floods in more than 50 years threaten to overwhelm barriers protecting Bangkok, and residents should be prepared, said Deputy Prime Minister Kittiratt Na-Ranong.

headline.main: Thailand: Bangkok Is Warned of Flood Danger Next Week
headline.print_headline: Thailand: Bangkok Is Warned Of Flood Danger Next Week
headline.seo: In, Thailand, Bangkok Is Warned Of Flood Danger Next Week
